title: Private Ceremony-up to 4 people for one + hour (Fire Purification/Full Moon/Medicine Wheel,+) - Sedona Sacred Rocks
description: Powerful Healing Ceremony taught to us by our Teacher and Spiritual Elders .... Purify and cleanse the aura in a very deep and powerful way with Native American Pranic Healing Spiritual Teachings with the element of fire in our beautiful Tipi. For smaller groups, up to 3 people. See our large group listing for up to 12 people. :)
